diff_hunk:
@@ -86,7 +87,8 @@ def report_uninitialized_resources(resource_list=None,
     resource_list = shared_resources() + local_resources()
   with ops.name_scope(name):
     # Run all operations on CPU
-    with ops.device("/cpu:0"):
+    local_device = os.environ.get("TF_LOCAL_DEVICE", "/cpu:0")
body: Yes.  "with ops.device('/cpu:0')" also appears at some other places, such as 'tensorflow/python/estimator/estimator.py'. I think it will lead to OOM when the workers are too many, but I do not use it in my case.
